mapper.insert: insert into student (name, student_number, gender, phone, highest_degree, classes_id, create_time, update_time) values (#{name}, #{studentNumber}, #{gender}, #{phone}, #{highestDegree}, #{classesId}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select student.id, student.name, student.student_number as s_number, student.gender, student.phone, student.highest_degree, student.discipline_times, student.discipline_score, student.update_time, classes.id as c_id, classes.name as c_name from student left outer join classes on student.classes_id = classes.id
student.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
highest_degree = #{highestDegree})
classes_id = #{classesId})
s_number = #{studentNumber})
order by update_time desc
